name: ynab-mcp-server
description: Model Context Protocol server for YNAB (You Need A Budget) integration

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && npm run bundle
scripts.build:no-lint: npm run clean && tsc && npm run bundle
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild && tsc --project tsconfig.prod.json && npm run bundle:prod && npm run verify-build
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:performance
scripts.filter-test-results: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try { const results = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('test-results.json', 'utf-8')); results.testResults = results.testResults.filter(r => r.status === 'fail'); fs.writeFileSync('test-results.json', JSON.stringify(results, null, 2)); } catch (e) { console.error('Failed to filter test results:', e); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.package:dxt: npm run build:prod && npm run generate:dxt
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test:all && npm run build:prod
